Function Details: check_login 
 Param Details : 
{"username":"jamal","password":"74f56399c89f4bd03ff5e85b6bf4e85f"}


[2018-11-24 14:21:29]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT id as emp_id, name, email,office_email, username
						, is_admin, initial_pswd
						, (select id from cms_master_list where cms_master_list.id = cms_employees.access_level) as access_level
						
						, cms_emp_login_sessions.token
		                , accessible_ctg
						, malaysia_phone
						, concat('http://127.0.0.1/code/projects/mspdoc/services/files/', 'photos/',id,'.jpeg') as profile_pic
		                , super_admin  FROM cms_employees
						LEFT join cms_emp_login_sessions ON
						 	cms_employees.id = cms_emp_login_sessions.emp_id WHERE cms_employees.username	= 'jamal' AND cms_employees.pswd = '74f56399c89f4bd03ff5e85b6bf4e85f' AND cms_employees.is_active = 1

SELECT 
        id
        , employee_no
        , name
        , photoname
		, ic_passport
		, sex_id
		, age
		, date_format(dob,'%d-%m-%Y') as dob
		, nationality
		, birth_place
		, religion
		, race
		, designation
        , employer_id
		, home_phone
		, malaysia_phone
		, office_phone
		, local_address
        , home_address
        , home_country
		, email
		, office_email
		, username
        , pswd
		, is_admin
        , access_level
		, chat_id
		, dept_id
		, reporting_to_id
		, allow_add
        , allow_approve
        , allow_verify
        , allow_contract_approve
		, allow_contract_create
		, allow_contract_view_all
		, allow_contract_access
		, general_skills
        , specific_skills
        , date_format(work_start_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as work_start_date
        , date_format(work_end_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as work_end_date
        , salary
        , date_format(ep_valid_till,'%d-%m-%Y') as ep_valid_till
        , notice_period_id
		, spouse_name
		, spouse_occupation
		, date_format(marriage_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as marriage_date
		, spouse_ic
		, spouse_company
		, spouse_company_address
		, no_of_children
		, emergency_person
		, emergency_relation
		, emergency_address
		, emergency_phone
		, bank_acc_name
		, bank_acc_ic
		, bank_name
		, bank_account_no
		, accessible_ctg
		, super_admin
		, is_active
		, concat('http://127.0.0.1/code/projects/mspdoc/services/files/', 'photos/',id,'.jpeg') as profile_pic
		, date_format(leaving_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as leaving_date
		, leaving_reason
		, created_by
        , (select employer_name from cms_master_employer where cms_master_employer.id = cms_employees.employer_id) as employer_name
        , (select descr from cms_master_list where cms_master_list.id = cms_employees.dept_id) as dept_name
        , (select descr from cms_master_list where cms_master_list.id = cms_employees.notice_period_id) as notice_period
        , (select descr from cms_master_list where cms_master_list.id = cms_employees.access_level) as access_level_name
         FROM cms_employees WHERE id = 15

[2018-11-24 14:21:37]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_quotation.quote_no
				, cms_quotation.quote_date
				, cms_quotation.client_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_quotation.attention_to
				, cms_quotation.email_content
				, cms_quotation.email
				, cms_quotation.attachment
				, cms_quotation.remarks
				, cms_quotation.approvals
				, cms_quotation.status_id
				, cms_quotation.created_date
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_quotation.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_quotation
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_quotation.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_quotation.created_by) AND cms_quotation.is_active in(1) ORDER BY quote_no DESC limit 0,10

Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT 
        id
        , employee_no
        , name
        , photoname
		, ic_passport
		, sex_id
		, age
		, date_format(dob,'%d-%m-%Y') as dob
		, nationality
		, birth_place
		, religion
		, race
		, designation
        , employer_id
		, home_phone
		, malaysia_phone
		, office_phone
		, local_address
        , home_address
        , home_country
		, email
		, office_email
		, username
        , pswd
		, is_admin
        , access_level
		, chat_id
		, dept_id
		, reporting_to_id
		, allow_add
        , allow_approve
        , allow_verify
        , allow_contract_approve
		, allow_contract_create
		, allow_contract_view_all
		, allow_contract_access
		, general_skills
        , specific_skills
        , date_format(work_start_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as work_start_date
        , date_format(work_end_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as work_end_date
        , salary
        , date_format(ep_valid_till,'%d-%m-%Y') as ep_valid_till
        , notice_period_id
		, spouse_name
		, spouse_occupation
		, date_format(marriage_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as marriage_date
		, spouse_ic
		, spouse_company

		, emergency_person

		, bank_acc_ic
		, bank_name
		, bank_account_no
		, accessible_ctg
		, super_admin
		, is_active
		, concat('http://127.0.0.1/code/projects/mspdoc/services/files/', 'photos/',id,'.jpeg') as profile_pic
		, date_format(leaving_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as leaving_date
		, leaving_reason
		, created_by
        , (select employer_name from cms_master_employer where cms_master_employer.id = cms_employees.employer_id) as employer_name
        , (select descr from cms_master_list where cms_master_list.id = cms_employees.dept_id) as dept_name
        , (select descr from cms_master_list where cms_master_list.id = cms_employees.notice_period_id) as notice_period
        , (select descr from cms_master_list where cms_master_list.id = cms_employees.access_level) as access_level_name
         FROM cms_employees WHERE id = 15

[2018-11-24 14:35:54]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_quotation.quote_no
				, cms_quotation.quote_date
				, cms_quotation.client_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_quotation.attention_to
				, cms_quotation.email_content
				, cms_quotation.email
				, cms_quotation.attachment
				, cms_quotation.remarks
				, cms_quotation.approvals
				, cms_quotation.status_id
				, cms_quotation.created_date
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_quotation.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_quotation
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_quotation.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_quotation.created_by) AND cms_quotation.is_active in(1) ORDER BY quote_no DESC limit 0,10

Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT 
        id
        , employee_no
        , name
        , photoname
		, ic_passport
		, sex_id
		, age
		, date_format(dob,'%d-%m-%Y') as dob
		, nationality
		, birth_place
		, religion
		, race
		, designation
        , employer_id
		, home_phone
		, malaysia_phone
		, office_phone
		, local_address
        , home_address
        , home_country
		, email
		, office_email
		, username
        , pswd
		, is_admin
        , access_level
		, chat_id
		, dept_id
		, reporting_to_id
		, allow_add
        , allow_approve
        , allow_verify
        , allow_contract_approve
		, allow_contract_create
		, allow_contract_view_all
		, allow_contract_access
		, general_skills
        , specific_skills
        , date_format(work_start_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as work_start_date
        , date_format(work_end_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as work_end_date
        , salary
        , date_format(ep_valid_till,'%d-%m-%Y') as ep_valid_till
        , notice_period_id
		, spouse_name
		, spouse_occupation
		, date_format(marriage_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as marriage_date
		, spouse_ic
		, spouse_company
		, spouse_company_address
		, no_of_children
		, emergency_person
		, emergency_relation
		, emergency_address
		, emergency_phone
		, bank_acc_name
		, bank_acc_ic
		, bank_name
		, bank_account_no
		, accessible_ctg
		, super_admin
		, is_active
		, concat('http://127.0.0.1/code/projects/mspdoc/services/files/', 'photos/',id,'.jpeg') as profile_pic
		, date_format(leaving_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as leaving_date
		, leaving_reason
		, created_by
        , (select employer_name from cms_master_employer where cms_master_employer.id = cms_employees.employer_id) as employer_name
        , (select descr from cms_master_list where cms_master_list.id = cms_employees.dept_id) as dept_name
        , (select descr from cms_master_list where cms_master_list.id = cms_employees.notice_period_id) as notice_period
        , (select descr from cms_master_list where cms_master_list.id = cms_employees.access_level) as access_level_name
         FROM cms_employees WHERE id = 15

[2018-11-24 14:36:16]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_quotation.quote_no
				, cms_quotation.quote_date
				, cms_quotation.client_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_quotation.attention_to
				, cms_quotation.email_content
				, cms_quotation.email
				, cms_quotation.attachment
				, cms_quotation.remarks
				, cms_quotation.approvals
				, cms_quotation.status_id
				, cms_quotation.created_date
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_quotation.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_quotation
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_quotation.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_quotation.created_by) AND cms_quotation.is_active in(1) ORDER BY quote_no DESC limit 0,10

Function Details: get_employees_details 
 Param Details :

[2018-11-24 14:36:20]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT 
        id
        , employee_no
        , name
        , photoname
		, ic_passport
		, sex_id
		, age
		, date_format(dob,'%d-%m-%Y') as dob
		, nationality
		, birth_place
		, religion
		, race
		, designation
        , employer_id
		, home_phone
		, malaysia_phone
		, office_phone
		, local_address
        , home_address
        , home_country
		, email
		, office_email
		, username
        , pswd
		, is_admin
        , access_level
		, chat_id
		, dept_id
		, reporting_to_id
		, allow_add
        , allow_approve
        , allow_verify
        , allow_contract_approve
		, allow_contract_create
		, allow_contract_view_all
		, allow_contract_access
		, general_skills
        , specific_skills
        , date_format(work_start_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as work_start_date
        , date_format(work_end_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as work_end_date
        , salary
        , date_format(ep_valid_till,'%d-%m-%Y') as ep_valid_till
        , notice_period_id
		, spouse_name
		, spouse_occupation
		, date_format(marriage_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as marriage_date
		, spouse_ic
		, spouse_company
		, spouse_company_address
		, no_of_children
		, emergency_person
		, emergency_relation
		, emergency_address
		, emergency_phone
		, bank_acc_name
		, bank_acc_ic
		, bank_name
		, bank_account_no
		, accessible_ctg
		, super_admin
		, is_active
		, concat('http://127.0.0.1/code/projects/mspdoc/services/files/', 'photos/',id,'.jpeg') as profile_pic
		, date_format(leaving_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as leaving_date
		, leaving_reason
		, created_by
        , (select employer_name from cms_master_employer where cms_master_employer.id = cms_employees.employer_id) as employer_name
        , (select descr from cms_master_list where cms_master_list.id = cms_employees.dept_id) as dept_name
        , (select descr from cms_master_list where cms_master_list.id = cms_employees.notice_period_id) as notice_period
        , (select descr from cms_master_list where cms_master_list.id = cms_employees.access_level) as access_level_name
         FROM cms_employees WHERE id = 15

SELECT cms_employees.id, cms_employees.name, cms_employees.office_email as email, cms_master_employer.employer_name  as company_name FROM cms_employees INNER JOIN cms_master_employer ON cms_employees.employer_id = cms_master_employer.id WHERE cms_employees.is_active = 1

Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT id as emp_id, name, email,office_email, username
						, is_admin, initial_pswd
						, (select id from cms_master_list where cms_master_list.id = cms_employees.access_level) as access_level
						
						, cms_emp_login_sessions.token
		                , accessible_ctg
						, malaysia_phone
						, concat('http://127.0.0.1/code/projects/mspdoc/services/files/', 'photos/',id,'.jpeg') as profile_pic
		                , super_admin  FROM cms_employees
						LEFT join cms_emp_login_sessions ON
						 	cms_employees.id = cms_emp_login_sessions.emp_id WHERE cms_employees.username	= 'jamal' AND cms_employees.pswd = '74f56399c89f4bd03ff5e85b6bf4e85f' AND cms_employees.is_active = 1

Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT 
        id
        , employee_no
        , name
        , photoname
		, ic_passport
		, sex_id
		, age
		, date_format(dob,'%d-%m-%Y') as dob
		, nationality
		, birth_place
		, religion
		, race
		, designation
        , employer_id
		, home_phone
		, malaysia_phone
		, office_phone
		, local_address
        , home_address
        , home_country
		, email
		, office_email
		, username
        , pswd
		, is_admin
        , access_level
		, chat_id
		, dept_id
		, reporting_to_id
		, allow_add
        , allow_approve
        , allow_verify
        , allow_contract_approve
		, allow_contract_create
		, allow_contract_view_all
		, allow_contract_access
		, general_skills
        , specific_skills
        , date_format(work_start_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as work_start_date
        , date_format(work_end_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as work_end_date
        , salary
        , date_format(ep_valid_till,'%d-%m-%Y') as ep_valid_till
        , notice_period_id
		, spouse_name
		, spouse_occupation
		, date_format(marriage_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as marriage_date
		, spouse_ic
		, spouse_company
		, spouse_company_address
		, no_of_children
		, emergency_person
		, emergency_relation
		, emergency_address
		, emergency_phone
		, bank_acc_name
		, bank_acc_ic
		, bank_name
		, bank_account_no
		, accessible_ctg
		, super_admin
		, is_active
		, concat('http://127.0.0.1/code/projects/mspdoc/services/files/', 'photos/',id,'.jpeg') as profile_pic
		, date_format(leaving_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as leaving_date
		, leaving_reason
		, created_by
        , (select employer_name from cms_master_employer where cms_master_employer.id = cms_employees.employer_id) as employer_name
        , (select descr from cms_master_list where cms_master_list.id = cms_employees.dept_id) as dept_name
        , (select descr from cms_master_list where cms_master_list.id = cms_employees.notice_period_id) as notice_period
        , (select descr from cms_master_list where cms_master_list.id = cms_employees.access_level) as access_level_name
         FROM cms_employees WHERE id = 15

Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT id as emp_id, name, email,office_email, username
						, is_admin, initial_pswd
						, (select id from cms_master_list where cms_master_list.id = cms_employees.access_level) as access_level
						
						, cms_emp_login_sessions.token
		                , accessible_ctg
						, malaysia_phone
						, concat('http://127.0.0.1/code/projects/mspdoc/services/files/', 'photos/',id,'.jpeg') as profile_pic
		                , super_admin  FROM cms_employees
						LEFT join cms_emp_login_sessions ON
						 	cms_employees.id = cms_emp_login_sessions.emp_id WHERE cms_employees.username	= 'jamal' AND cms_employees.pswd = '74f56399c89f4bd03ff5e85b6bf4e85f' AND cms_employees.is_active = 1

SELECT 
        id
        , employee_no
        , name
        , photoname
		, ic_passport
		, sex_id
		, age
		, date_format(dob,'%d-%m-%Y') as dob
		, nationality
		, birth_place
		, religion
		, race
		, designation
        , employer_id
		, home_phone
		, malaysia_phone
		, office_phone
		, local_address
        , home_address
        , home_country
		, email
		, office_email
		, username
        , pswd
		, is_admin
        , access_level
		, chat_id
		, dept_id
		, reporting_to_id
		, allow_add
        , allow_approve
        , allow_verify
        , allow_contract_approve
		, allow_contract_create
		, allow_contract_view_all
		, allow_contract_access
		, general_skills
        , specific_skills
        , date_format(work_start_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as work_start_date
        , date_format(work_end_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as work_end_date
        , salary
        , date_format(ep_valid_till,'%d-%m-%Y') as ep_valid_till
        , notice_period_id
		, spouse_name
		, spouse_occupation
		, date_format(marriage_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as marriage_date
		, spouse_ic
		, spouse_company
		, spouse_company_address
		, no_of_children
		, emergency_person
		, emergency_relation
		, emergency_address
		, emergency_phone
		, bank_acc_name
		, bank_acc_ic
		, bank_name
		, bank_account_no
		, accessible_ctg
		, super_admin
		, is_active
		, concat('http://127.0.0.1/code/projects/mspdoc/services/files/', 'photos/',id,'.jpeg') as profile_pic
		, date_format(leaving_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as leaving_date
		, leaving_reason
		, created_by
        , (select employer_name from cms_master_employer where cms_master_employer.id = cms_employees.employer_id) as employer_name
        , (select descr from cms_master_list where cms_master_list.id = cms_employees.dept_id) as dept_name
        , (select descr from cms_master_list where cms_master_list.id = cms_employees.notice_period_id) as notice_period
        , (select descr from cms_master_list where cms_master_list.id = cms_employees.access_level) as access_level_name
         FROM cms_employees WHERE id = 15

[2018-11-24 14:38:19]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_quotation.quote_no
				, cms_quotation.quote_date
				, cms_quotation.client_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_quotation.attention_to
				, cms_quotation.email_content
				, cms_quotation.email
				, cms_quotation.attachment
				, cms_quotation.remarks
				, cms_quotation.approvals
				, cms_quotation.status_id
				, cms_quotation.created_date
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_quotation.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_quotation
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_quotation.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_quotation.created_by) AND cms_quotation.is_active in(1) ORDER BY quote_no DESC limit 0,10

 Param Details :

Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT id as emp_id, name, email,office_email, username
						, is_admin, initial_pswd
						, (select id from cms_master_list where cms_master_list.id = cms_employees.access_level) as access_level
						
						, cms_emp_login_sessions.token
		                , accessible_ctg
						, malaysia_phone
						, concat('http://127.0.0.1/code/projects/mspdoc/services/files/', 'photos/',id,'.jpeg') as profile_pic
		                , super_admin  FROM cms_employees
						LEFT join cms_emp_login_sessions ON
						 	cms_employees.id = cms_emp_login_sessions.emp_id WHERE cms_employees.username	= 'jamal' AND cms_employees.pswd = '74f56399c89f4bd03ff5e85b6bf4e85f' AND cms_employees.is_active = 1

SELECT 
        id
        , employee_no
        , name
        , photoname
		, ic_passport
		, sex_id
		, age
		, date_format(dob,'%d-%m-%Y') as dob
		, nationality
		, birth_place
		, religion
		, race
		, designation
        , employer_id
		, home_phone
		, malaysia_phone
		, office_phone
		, local_address
        , home_address
        , home_country
		, email
		, office_email
		, username
        , pswd
		, is_admin
        , access_level
		, chat_id
		, dept_id
		, reporting_to_id
		, allow_add
        , allow_approve
        , allow_verify
        , allow_contract_approve
		, allow_contract_create
		, allow_contract_view_all
		, allow_contract_access
		, general_skills
        , specific_skills
        , date_format(work_start_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as work_start_date
        , date_format(work_end_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as work_end_date
        , salary
        , date_format(ep_valid_till,'%d-%m-%Y') as ep_valid_till
        , notice_period_id
		, spouse_name
		, spouse_occupation
		, date_format(marriage_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as marriage_date
		, spouse_ic
		, spouse_company
		, spouse_company_address
		, no_of_children
		, emergency_person

		, emergency_phone

		, bank_acc_ic

		, bank_account_no
		, accessible_ctg
		, super_admin
		, is_active

		, date_format(leaving_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as leaving_date
		, leaving_reason
		, created_by
        , (select employer_name from cms_master_employer where cms_master_employer.id = cms_employees.employer_id) as employer_name
        , (select descr from cms_master_list where cms_master_list.id = cms_employees.dept_id) as dept_name
        , (select descr from cms_master_list where cms_master_list.id = cms_employees.notice_period_id) as notice_period
        , (select descr from cms_master_list where cms_master_list.id = cms_employees.access_level) as access_level_name
         FROM cms_employees WHERE id = 15

		, date_format(marriage_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as marriage_date
		, spouse_ic
		, spouse_company
		, spouse_company_address
		, no_of_children
		, emergency_person
		, emergency_relation
		, emergency_address
		, emergency_phone
		, bank_acc_name
		, bank_acc_ic
		, bank_name
		, bank_account_no
		, accessible_ctg
		, super_admin
		, is_active
		, concat('http://127.0.0.1/code/projects/mspdoc/services/files/', 'photos/',id,'.jpeg') as profile_pic
		, date_format(leaving_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as leaving_date
		, leaving_reason
		, created_by
        , (select employer_name from cms_master_employer where cms_master_employer.id = cms_employees.employer_id) as employer_name
        , (select descr from cms_master_list where cms_master_list.id = cms_employees.dept_id) as dept_name
        , (select descr from cms_master_list where cms_master_list.id = cms_employees.notice_period_id) as notice_period
        , (select descr from cms_master_list where cms_master_list.id = cms_employees.access_level) as access_level_name
         FROM cms_employees WHERE id = 15

[2018-11-24 14:42:41]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_quotation.quote_no
				, cms_quotation.quote_date
				, cms_quotation.client_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_quotation.attention_to
				, cms_quotation.email_content
				, cms_quotation.email
				, cms_quotation.attachment
				, cms_quotation.remarks
				, cms_quotation.approvals
				, cms_quotation.status_id
				, cms_quotation.created_date
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_quotation.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_quotation
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_quotation.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_quotation.created_by) AND cms_quotation.is_active in(1) ORDER BY quote_no DESC limit 0,10

		                , accessible_ctg

						, concat('http://127.0.0.1/code/projects/mspdoc/services/files/', 'photos/',id,'.jpeg') as profile_pic
		                , super_admin  FROM cms_employees

[2018-11-24 14:42:52]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_quotation.quote_no
				, cms_quotation.quote_date
				, cms_quotation.client_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_quotation.attention_to
				, cms_quotation.email_content
				, cms_quotation.email
				, cms_quotation.attachment
				, cms_quotation.remarks
				, cms_quotation.approvals
				, cms_quotation.status_id
				, cms_quotation.created_date
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_quotation.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_quotation
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_quotation.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_quotation.created_by) AND cms_quotation.is_active in(1) ORDER BY quote_no DESC limit 0,10

[2018-11-24 14:42:54]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_quotation.quote_no
				, cms_quotation.quote_date
				, cms_quotation.client_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_quotation.attention_to
				, cms_quotation.email_content
				, cms_quotation.email
				, cms_quotation.attachment
				, cms_quotation.remarks
				, cms_quotation.approvals
				, cms_quotation.status_id
				, cms_quotation.created_date
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_quotation.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_quotation
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_quotation.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_quotation.created_by) AND cms_quotation.is_active in(1) ORDER BY quote_no DESC limit 0,10


[2018-11-24 14:43:17]
Function Details: check_login 
 Param Details :

Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT id as emp_id, name, email,office_email, username
						, is_admin, initial_pswd
						, (select id from cms_master_list where cms_master_list.id = cms_employees.access_level) as access_level
						
						, cms_emp_login_sessions.token
		                , accessible_ctg
						, malaysia_phone
						, concat('http://127.0.0.1/code/projects/mspdoc/services/files/', 'photos/',id,'.jpeg') as profile_pic
		                , super_admin  FROM cms_employees
						LEFT join cms_emp_login_sessions ON
						 	cms_employees.id = cms_emp_login_sessions.emp_id WHERE cms_employees.username	= 'jamal' AND cms_employees.pswd = '74f56399c89f4bd03ff5e85b6bf4e85f' AND cms_employees.is_active = 1

Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT 
        id
        , employee_no
        , name
        , photoname
		, ic_passport
		, sex_id
		, age
		, date_format(dob,'%d-%m-%Y') as dob
		, nationality
		, birth_place
		, religion
		, race
		, designation
        , employer_id
		, home_phone
		, malaysia_phone
		, office_phone
		, local_address
        , home_address
        , home_country
		, email
		, office_email
		, username
        , pswd
		, is_admin
        , access_level
		, chat_id
		, dept_id
		, reporting_to_id
		, allow_add
        , allow_approve
        , allow_verify
        , allow_contract_approve
		, allow_contract_create
		, allow_contract_view_all
		, allow_contract_access
		, general_skills
        , specific_skills
        , date_format(work_start_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as work_start_date
        , date_format(work_end_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as work_end_date
        , salary
        , date_format(ep_valid_till,'%d-%m-%Y') as ep_valid_till
        , notice_period_id
		, spouse_name
		, spouse_occupation
		, date_format(marriage_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as marriage_date
		, spouse_ic
		, spouse_company
		, spouse_company_address
		, no_of_children
		, emergency_person
		, emergency_relation
		, emergency_address
		, emergency_phone
		, bank_acc_name
		, bank_acc_ic
		, bank_name
		, bank_account_no
		, accessible_ctg
		, super_admin
		, is_active
		, concat('http://127.0.0.1/code/projects/mspdoc/services/files/', 'photos/',id,'.jpeg') as profile_pic
		, date_format(leaving_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as leaving_date
		, leaving_reason
		, created_by
        , (select employer_name from cms_master_employer where cms_master_employer.id = cms_employees.employer_id) as employer_name
        , (select descr from cms_master_list where cms_master_list.id = cms_employees.dept_id) as dept_name
        , (select descr from cms_master_list where cms_master_list.id = cms_employees.notice_period_id) as notice_period
        , (select descr from cms_master_list where cms_master_list.id = cms_employees.access_level) as access_level_name
         FROM cms_employees WHERE id = 15

Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_quotation.quote_no
				, cms_quotation.quote_date
				, cms_quotation.client_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_quotation.attention_to
				, cms_quotation.email_content
				, cms_quotation.email
				, cms_quotation.attachment
				, cms_quotation.remarks
				, cms_quotation.approvals
				, cms_quotation.status_id
				, cms_quotation.created_date
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_quotation.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_quotation
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_quotation.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_quotation.created_by) AND cms_quotation.is_active in(1) ORDER BY quote_no DESC limit 0,10

[2018-11-24 14:45:34]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT 
        id
        , employee_no
        , name
        , photoname
		, ic_passport
		, sex_id
		, age
		, date_format(dob,'%d-%m-%Y') as dob
		, nationality
		, birth_place
		, religion
		, race
		, designation
        , employer_id
		, home_phone
		, malaysia_phone
		, office_phone
		, local_address
        , home_address
        , home_country
		, email
		, office_email
		, username
        , pswd
		, is_admin
        , access_level
		, chat_id
		, dept_id
		, reporting_to_id
		, allow_add
        , allow_approve
        , allow_verify
        , allow_contract_approve
		, allow_contract_create
		, allow_contract_view_all
		, allow_contract_access
		, general_skills
        , specific_skills
        , date_format(work_start_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as work_start_date
        , date_format(work_end_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as work_end_date
        , salary
        , date_format(ep_valid_till,'%d-%m-%Y') as ep_valid_till
        , notice_period_id
		, spouse_name
		, spouse_occupation
		, date_format(marriage_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as marriage_date
		, spouse_ic
		, spouse_company
		, spouse_company_address
		, no_of_children
		, emergency_person
		, emergency_relation
		, emergency_address
		, emergency_phone
		, bank_acc_name
		, bank_acc_ic
		, bank_name
		, bank_account_no
		, accessible_ctg
		, super_admin
		, is_active
		, concat('http://127.0.0.1/code/projects/mspdoc/services/files/', 'photos/',id,'.jpeg') as profile_pic
		, date_format(leaving_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as leaving_date
		, leaving_reason
		, created_by
        , (select employer_name from cms_master_employer where cms_master_employer.id = cms_employees.employer_id) as employer_name
        , (select descr from cms_master_list where cms_master_list.id = cms_employees.dept_id) as dept_name
        , (select descr from cms_master_list where cms_master_list.id = cms_employees.notice_period_id) as notice_period
        , (select descr from cms_master_list where cms_master_list.id = cms_employees.access_level) as access_level_name
         FROM cms_employees WHERE id = 15

Function Details: get_document_archiving_list 
 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","start_index":0,"limit":10}


[2018-11-24 14:46:20]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_quotation.quote_no
				, cms_quotation.quote_date
				, cms_quotation.client_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_quotation.attention_to
				, cms_quotation.email_content
				, cms_quotation.email
				, cms_quotation.attachment
				, cms_quotation.remarks
				, cms_quotation.approvals
				, cms_quotation.status_id
				, cms_quotation.created_date
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_quotation.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_quotation
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_quotation.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE  IN (cms_quotation.created_by) AND cms_quotation.is_active in(1) ORDER BY quote_no DESC limit 0,10

[2018-11-24 14:46:49]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_quotation.quote_no
				, cms_quotation.quote_date
				, cms_quotation.client_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_quotation.attention_to
				, cms_quotation.email_content
				, cms_quotation.email
				, cms_quotation.attachment
				, cms_quotation.remarks
				, cms_quotation.approvals
				, cms_quotation.status_id
				, cms_quotation.created_date
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_quotation.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_quotation
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_quotation.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_quotation.created_by) AND cms_quotation.is_active in(1) ORDER BY quote_no DESC limit 0,10

Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_quotation.quote_no
				, cms_quotation.quote_date
				, cms_quotation.client_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_quotation.attention_to
				, cms_quotation.email_content
				, cms_quotation.email
				, cms_quotation.attachment
				, cms_quotation.remarks
				, cms_quotation.approvals
				, cms_quotation.status_id
				, cms_quotation.created_date
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_quotation.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_quotation
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_quotation.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_quotation.created_by) AND cms_quotation.is_active in(1) ORDER BY quote_no DESC limit 0,10

 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-11-24 14:50:33]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_quotation.quote_no
				, cms_quotation.quote_date
				, cms_quotation.client_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_quotation.attention_to
				, cms_quotation.email_content
				, cms_quotation.email
				, cms_quotation.attachment
				, cms_quotation.remarks
				, cms_quotation.approvals
				, cms_quotation.status_id
				, cms_quotation.created_date
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_quotation.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_quotation
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_quotation.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_quotation.created_by) AND cms_quotation.is_active in(1) ORDER BY quote_no DESC limit 0,10

Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT id as emp_id, name, email,office_email, username
						, is_admin, initial_pswd
						, (select id from cms_master_list where cms_master_list.id = cms_employees.access_level) as access_level
						
						, cms_emp_login_sessions.token
		                , accessible_ctg
						, malaysia_phone
						, concat('http://127.0.0.1/code/projects/mspdoc/services/files/', 'photos/',id,'.jpeg') as profile_pic
		                , super_admin  FROM cms_employees
						LEFT join cms_emp_login_sessions ON
						 	cms_employees.id = cms_emp_login_sessions.emp_id WHERE cms_employees.username	= 'jamal' AND cms_employees.pswd = '74f56399c89f4bd03ff5e85b6bf4e85f' AND cms_employees.is_active = 1

Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT 
        id
        , employee_no
        , name
        , photoname
		, ic_passport
		, sex_id
		, age
		, date_format(dob,'%d-%m-%Y') as dob
		, nationality
		, birth_place
		, religion
		, race
		, designation
        , employer_id
		, home_phone
		, malaysia_phone
		, office_phone
		, local_address
        , home_address
        , home_country
		, email
		, office_email
		, username
        , pswd
		, is_admin
        , access_level
		, chat_id
		, dept_id
		, reporting_to_id
		, allow_add
        , allow_approve
        , allow_verify
        , allow_contract_approve
		, allow_contract_create
		, allow_contract_view_all
		, allow_contract_access
		, general_skills
        , specific_skills
        , date_format(work_start_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as work_start_date
        , date_format(work_end_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as work_end_date
        , salary
        , date_format(ep_valid_till,'%d-%m-%Y') as ep_valid_till
        , notice_period_id
		, spouse_name
		, spouse_occupation
		, date_format(marriage_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as marriage_date
		, spouse_ic
		, spouse_company
		, spouse_company_address
		, no_of_children
		, emergency_person
		, emergency_relation
		, emergency_address
		, emergency_phone
		, bank_acc_name
		, bank_acc_ic
		, bank_name
		, bank_account_no
		, accessible_ctg
		, super_admin
		, is_active
		, concat('http://127.0.0.1/code/projects/mspdoc/services/files/', 'photos/',id,'.jpeg') as profile_pic
		, date_format(leaving_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as leaving_date
		, leaving_reason
		, created_by
        , (select employer_name from cms_master_employer where cms_master_employer.id = cms_employees.employer_id) as employer_name
        , (select descr from cms_master_list where cms_master_list.id = cms_employees.dept_id) as dept_name
        , (select descr from cms_master_list where cms_master_list.id = cms_employees.notice_period_id) as notice_period
        , (select descr from cms_master_list where cms_master_list.id = cms_employees.access_level) as access_level_name
         FROM cms_employees WHERE id = 15

{"client_id":"","created_by":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-11-24 14:51:02]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_quotation.quote_no
				, cms_quotation.quote_date
				, cms_quotation.client_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_quotation.attention_to
				, cms_quotation.email_content
				, cms_quotation.email
				, cms_quotation.attachment
				, cms_quotation.remarks
				, cms_quotation.approvals
				, cms_quotation.status_id
				, cms_quotation.created_date
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_quotation.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_quotation
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_quotation.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_quotation.created_by) AND cms_quotation.is_active in(1) ORDER BY quote_no DESC limit 0,10

Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_quotation.quote_no
				, cms_quotation.quote_date
				, cms_quotation.client_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_quotation.attention_to
				, cms_quotation.email_content
				, cms_quotation.email
				, cms_quotation.attachment
				, cms_quotation.remarks
				, cms_quotation.approvals
				, cms_quotation.status_id
				, cms_quotation.created_date
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_quotation.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_quotation
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_quotation.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_quotation.created_by) AND cms_quotation.is_active in(1) ORDER BY quote_no DESC limit 0,10

 Param Details :

[2018-11-24 14:51:07]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT id as emp_id, name, email,office_email, username
						, is_admin, initial_pswd
						, (select id from cms_master_list where cms_master_list.id = cms_employees.access_level) as access_level
						
						, cms_emp_login_sessions.token
		                , accessible_ctg
						, malaysia_phone
						, concat('http://127.0.0.1/code/projects/mspdoc/services/files/', 'photos/',id,'.jpeg') as profile_pic

Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT 
        id
        , employee_no
        , name
        , photoname
		, ic_passport
		, sex_id
		, age
		, date_format(dob,'%d-%m-%Y') as dob
		, nationality
		, birth_place
		, religion
		, race
		, designation
        , employer_id
		, home_phone
		, malaysia_phone
		, office_phone
		, local_address
        , home_address
        , home_country
		, email
		, office_email
		, username
        , pswd
		, is_admin
        , access_level
		, chat_id
		, dept_id
		, reporting_to_id
		, allow_add
        , allow_approve
        , allow_verify
        , allow_contract_approve
		, allow_contract_create
		, allow_contract_view_all
		, allow_contract_access
		, general_skills
        , specific_skills
        , date_format(work_start_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as work_start_date
        , date_format(work_end_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as work_end_date
        , salary
        , date_format(ep_valid_till,'%d-%m-%Y') as ep_valid_till
        , notice_period_id
		, spouse_name
		, spouse_occupation
		, date_format(marriage_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as marriage_date
		, spouse_ic
		, spouse_company
		, spouse_company_address
		, no_of_children
		, emergency_person
		, emergency_relation
		, emergency_address
		, emergency_phone
		, bank_acc_name
		, bank_acc_ic
		, bank_name
		, bank_account_no
		, accessible_ctg
		, super_admin
		, is_active
		, concat('http://127.0.0.1/code/projects/mspdoc/services/files/', 'photos/',id,'.jpeg') as profile_pic
		, date_format(leaving_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as leaving_date
		, leaving_reason
		, created_by
        , (select employer_name from cms_master_employer where cms_master_employer.id = cms_employees.employer_id) as employer_name
        , (select descr from cms_master_list where cms_master_list.id = cms_employees.dept_id) as dept_name
        , (select descr from cms_master_list where cms_master_list.id = cms_employees.notice_period_id) as notice_period
        , (select descr from cms_master_list where cms_master_list.id = cms_employees.access_level) as access_level_name
         FROM cms_employees WHERE id = 15

[2018-11-24 14:54:31]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_quotation.quote_no
				, cms_quotation.quote_date
				, cms_quotation.client_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_quotation.attention_to
				, cms_quotation.email_content
				, cms_quotation.email
				, cms_quotation.attachment
				, cms_quotation.remarks
				, cms_quotation.approvals
				, cms_quotation.status_id
				, cms_quotation.created_date
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_quotation.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_quotation
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_quotation.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_quotation.created_by) AND cms_quotation.is_active in(1) ORDER BY quote_no DESC limit 0,10

						, is_admin, initial_pswd
						, (select id from cms_master_list where cms_master_list.id = cms_employees.access_level) as access_level
						
						, cms_emp_login_sessions.token
		                , accessible_ctg
						, malaysia_phone
						, concat('http://127.0.0.1/code/projects/mspdoc/services/files/', 'photos/',id,'.jpeg') as profile_pic
		                , super_admin  FROM cms_employees

[2018-11-24 14:54:36]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT 
        id
        , employee_no
        , name
        , photoname
		, ic_passport
		, sex_id
		, age
		, date_format(dob,'%d-%m-%Y') as dob
		, nationality
		, birth_place
		, religion
		, race
		, designation
        , employer_id
		, home_phone
		, malaysia_phone
		, office_phone
		, local_address
        , home_address
        , home_country
		, email
		, office_email
		, username
        , pswd
		, is_admin
        , access_level
		, chat_id
		, dept_id
		, reporting_to_id
		, allow_add
        , allow_approve
        , allow_verify
        , allow_contract_approve
		, allow_contract_create
		, allow_contract_view_all
		, allow_contract_access
		, general_skills
        , specific_skills
        , date_format(work_start_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as work_start_date
        , date_format(work_end_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as work_end_date
        , salary
        , date_format(ep_valid_till,'%d-%m-%Y') as ep_valid_till
        , notice_period_id
		, spouse_name
		, spouse_occupation
		, date_format(marriage_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as marriage_date
		, spouse_ic
		, spouse_company
		, spouse_company_address
		, no_of_children
		, emergency_person
		, emergency_relation
		, emergency_address
		, emergency_phone
		, bank_acc_name
		, bank_acc_ic
		, bank_name
		, bank_account_no
		, accessible_ctg
		, super_admin
		, is_active
		, concat('http://127.0.0.1/code/projects/mspdoc/services/files/', 'photos/',id,'.jpeg') as profile_pic
		, date_format(leaving_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as leaving_date
		, leaving_reason
		, created_by
        , (select employer_name from cms_master_employer where cms_master_employer.id = cms_employees.employer_id) as employer_name
        , (select descr from cms_master_list where cms_master_list.id = cms_employees.dept_id) as dept_name
        , (select descr from cms_master_list where cms_master_list.id = cms_employees.notice_period_id) as notice_period
        , (select descr from cms_master_list where cms_master_list.id = cms_employees.access_level) as access_level_name
         FROM cms_employees WHERE id = 15

 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-11-24 14:54:43]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_quotation.quote_no
				, cms_quotation.quote_date
				, cms_quotation.client_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_quotation.attention_to
				, cms_quotation.email_content
				, cms_quotation.email
				, cms_quotation.attachment
				, cms_quotation.remarks
				, cms_quotation.approvals
				, cms_quotation.status_id
				, cms_quotation.created_date
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_quotation.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_quotation
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_quotation.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_quotation.created_by) AND cms_quotation.is_active in(1) ORDER BY quote_no DESC limit 0,10

Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_quotation.quote_no
				, cms_quotation.quote_date
				, cms_quotation.client_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_quotation.attention_to
				, cms_quotation.email_content
				, cms_quotation.email
				, cms_quotation.attachment
				, cms_quotation.remarks
				, cms_quotation.approvals
				, cms_quotation.status_id
				, cms_quotation.created_date
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_quotation.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_quotation
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_quotation.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_quotation.created_by) AND cms_quotation.is_active in(1) ORDER BY quote_no DESC limit 0,10

SELECT cms_quotation.quote_no
				, cms_quotation.quote_date
				, cms_quotation.client_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_quotation.attention_to
				, cms_quotation.email_content
				, cms_quotation.email
				, cms_quotation.attachment
				, cms_quotation.remarks
				, cms_quotation.approvals
				, cms_quotation.status_id
				, cms_quotation.created_date
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_quotation.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_quotation
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_quotation.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_quotation.created_by) AND cms_quotation.is_active in(1) ORDER BY quote_no DESC limit 0,10

Business Layer: {"token":"03293db0a67871ad036730841905cf98","method":"get_quotation_list","data":{"client_id":"","created_by":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}}

Function Details: is_token_valid

"03293db0a67871ad036730841905cf98"


[2018-11-24 17:21:56]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT count(token) as token_count  FROM cms_emp_login_sessions WHERE token	= '03293db0a67871ad036730841905cf98'


[2018-11-24 17:21:56]
Function Details: get_quotation_list 
 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-11-24 17:21:56]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_quotation.quote_no
				, cms_quotation.quote_date
				, cms_quotation.client_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_quotation.attention_to
				, cms_quotation.email_content
				, cms_quotation.email
				, cms_quotation.attachment
				, cms_quotation.remarks
				, cms_quotation.approvals
				, cms_quotation.status_id
				, cms_quotation.created_date
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_quotation.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_quotation
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_quotation.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_quotation.created_by) AND cms_quotation.is_active in(1) ORDER BY quote_no DESC limit 0,10

[2018-11-24 17:28:42]
Business Layer: {"token":"03293db0a67871ad036730841905cf98","method":"get_document_archiving_list","data":{"client_id":"","created_by":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}}


[2018-11-24 17:28:42]
Function Details: is_token_valid 
 Param Details : 
"03293db0a67871ad036730841905cf98"


[2018-11-24 17:28:42]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT count(token) as token_count  FROM cms_emp_login_sessions WHERE token	= '03293db0a67871ad036730841905cf98'


[2018-11-24 17:28:42]
Function Details: get_document_archiving_list 
 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-11-24 17:28:42]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_document_archiving.doc_no
				, cms_document_archiving.doc_date
				, cms_document_archiving.client_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, IFNULL(cms_master_list.descr,'') as doc_type
				, cms_document_archiving.from_date
				, cms_document_archiving.to_date
				, IF(cms_document_archiving.notify = 1, 'Yes','No') as notify
				, cms_document_archiving.notify_by
				, cms_document_archiving.notify_email
				, cms_document_archiving.attachment
				, cms_document_archiving.remarks
				, cms_document_archiving.approvals
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_document_archiving.status_id) as status_name
				, cms_document_archiving.created_date
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_document_archiving.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_document_archiving
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_document_archiving.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_document_archiving.doc_type = cms_master_list.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_document_archiving.created_by) AND cms_document_archiving.is_active in(1) ORDER BY doc_no DESC limit 0,10

[2018-11-24 17:29:35]
Function Details: get_quotation_list 
 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-11-24 17:29:35]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_quotation.quote_no
				, cms_quotation.quote_date
				, cms_quotation.client_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_quotation.attention_to
				, cms_quotation.email_content
				, cms_quotation.email
				, cms_quotation.attachment
				, cms_quotation.remarks
				, cms_quotation.approvals
				, cms_quotation.status_id
				, cms_quotation.created_date
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_quotation.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_quotation
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_quotation.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_quotation.created_by) AND cms_quotation.is_active in(1) ORDER BY quote_no DESC limit 0,10

Business Layer: {"token":"03293db0a67871ad036730841905cf98","method":"get_quotation_list","data":{"client_id":"","created_by":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}}


[2018-11-24 18:15:13]
Function Details: is_token_valid 
 Param Details : 
"03293db0a67871ad036730841905cf98"


[2018-11-24 18:15:13]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT count(token) as token_count  FROM cms_emp_login_sessions WHERE token	= '03293db0a67871ad036730841905cf98'


[2018-11-24 18:15:13]
Function Details: get_quotation_list 
 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-11-24 18:15:13]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_quotation.quote_no
				, cms_quotation.quote_date
				, cms_quotation.client_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_quotation.attention_to
				, cms_quotation.email_content
				, cms_quotation.email
				, cms_quotation.attachment
				, cms_quotation.remarks
				, cms_quotation.approvals
				, cms_quotation.status_id
				, cms_quotation.created_date
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_quotation.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_quotation
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_quotation.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_quotation.created_by) AND cms_quotation.is_active in(1) ORDER BY quote_no DESC limit 0,10


[2018-11-24 18:15:16]

SELECT cms_quotation.quote_no
				, cms_quotation.quote_date
				, cms_quotation.client_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_quotation.attention_to
				, cms_quotation.email_content
				, cms_quotation.email
				, cms_quotation.attachment
				, cms_quotation.remarks

				, cms_quotation.status_id
				, cms_quotation.created_date
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_quotation.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_quotation
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_quotation.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_quotation.created_by) AND cms_quotation.is_active in(1) ORDER BY quote_no DESC limit 0,10

Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_quotation.quote_no
				, cms_quotation.quote_date
				, cms_quotation.client_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_quotation.attention_to
				, cms_quotation.email_content
				, cms_quotation.email
				, cms_quotation.attachment
				, cms_quotation.remarks
				, cms_quotation.approvals
				, cms_quotation.status_id
				, cms_quotation.created_date
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_quotation.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_quotation
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_quotation.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_quotation.created_by) AND cms_quotation.is_active in(1) ORDER BY quote_no DESC limit 0,10

				, cms_document_archiving.doc_date
				, cms_document_archiving.client_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, IFNULL(cms_master_list.descr,'') as doc_type
				, cms_document_archiving.from_date
				, cms_document_archiving.to_date
				, IF(cms_document_archiving.notify = 1, 'Yes','No') as notify
				, cms_document_archiving.notify_by
				, cms_document_archiving.notify_email
				, cms_document_archiving.attachment
				, cms_document_archiving.remarks
				, cms_document_archiving.approvals
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_document_archiving.status_id) as status_name
				, cms_document_archiving.created_date
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_document_archiving.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_document_archiving
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_document_archiving.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_document_archiving.doc_type = cms_master_list.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_document_archiving.created_by) AND cms_document_archiving.is_active in(1) ORDER BY doc_no DESC limit 0,10


[2018-11-24 18:33:49]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details:

[2018-11-24 18:33:49]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details:

[2018-11-24 18:33:52]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_document_archiving.doc_no
				, cms_document_archiving.doc_date
				, cms_document_archiving.client_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, IFNULL(cms_master_list.descr,'') as doc_type
				, cms_document_archiving.from_date
				, cms_document_archiving.to_date
				, IF(cms_document_archiving.notify = 1, 'Yes','No') as notify
				, cms_document_archiving.notify_by
				, cms_document_archiving.notify_email
				, cms_document_archiving.attachment
				, cms_document_archiving.remarks
				, cms_document_archiving.approvals
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_document_archiving.status_id) as status_name
				, cms_document_archiving.created_date
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_document_archiving.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_document_archiving
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_document_archiving.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_document_archiving.doc_type = cms_master_list.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_document_archiving.created_by) AND cms_document_archiving.is_active in(1) ORDER BY doc_no DESC limit 0,10

				, cms_document_archiving.doc_date
				, cms_document_archiving.client_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_document_archiving.from_date
				, cms_document_archiving.to_date
				, IF(cms_document_archiving.notify = 1, 'Yes','No') as notify
				, cms_document_archiving.notify_by
				, cms_document_archiving.notify_email
				, cms_document_archiving.attachment
				, cms_document_archiving.remarks
				, cms_document_archiving.approvals
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_document_archiving.status_id) as status_name
				, cms_document_archiving.created_date
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_document_archiving.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_document_archiving
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_document_archiving.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_document_archiving.created_by) AND cms_document_archiving.is_active in(1) ORDER BY doc_no DESC limit 0,10

				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_document_archiving.status_id) as status_name

SELECT cms_quotation.quote_no
				, cms_quotation.quote_date
				, cms_quotation.client_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_quotation.attention_to
				, cms_quotation.email_content
				, cms_quotation.email
				, cms_quotation.attachment
				, cms_quotation.remarks
				, cms_quotation.approvals
				, cms_quotation.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_quotation.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_quotation.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_quotation
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_quotation.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_quotation.created_by) AND cms_quotation.is_active in(1) ORDER BY quote_no DESC limit 0,10

 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_document_archiving.doc_no
				, cms_document_archiving.doc_date
				, cms_document_archiving.client_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_document_archiving.from_date
				, cms_document_archiving.to_date
				, IF(cms_document_archiving.notify = 1, 'Yes','No') as notify
				, cms_document_archiving.notify_by
				, cms_document_archiving.notify_email
				, cms_document_archiving.attachment
				, cms_document_archiving.remarks
				, cms_document_archiving.approvals
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_document_archiving.doc_type) as doc_type
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_document_archiving.status_id) as status_name
				, cms_document_archiving.created_date
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_document_archiving.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_document_archiving
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_document_archiving.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_document_archiving.created_by) AND cms_document_archiving.is_active in(1) ORDER BY doc_no DESC limit 0,10


[2018-11-24 18:42:55]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT id,name,office_email FROM cms_employees WHERE id =15 AND is_active = 1


[2018-11-24 18:42:55]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT id,name FROM cms_clients WHERE is_active = 1


[2018-11-24 18:42:55]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_employees.id, cms_employees.name, cms_employees.office_email as email, cms_master_employer.employer_name  as company_name FROM cms_employees INNER JOIN cms_master_employer ON cms_employees.employer_id = cms_master_employer.id WHERE cms_employees.is_active = 1


[2018-11-24 18:42:55]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT template_content FROM cms_master_template WHERE id = 25


[2018-11-24 18:42:55]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT id,descr FROM cms_master_list WHERE category_id = 34

Function Details: get_quotation_list 
 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-11-24 18:42:57]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_quotation.quote_no
				, cms_quotation.quote_date
				, cms_quotation.client_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_quotation.attention_to
				, cms_quotation.email_content
				, cms_quotation.email
				, cms_quotation.attachment
				, cms_quotation.remarks
				, cms_quotation.approvals
				, cms_quotation.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_quotation.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_quotation.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_quotation
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_quotation.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_quotation.created_by) AND cms_quotation.is_active in(1) ORDER BY quote_no DESC limit 0,10

[2018-11-24 18:49:39]
Function Details: get_quotation_list 
 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-11-24 18:49:39]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_quotation.quote_no
				, cms_quotation.quote_date
				, cms_quotation.client_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_quotation.attention_to
				, cms_quotation.email_content
				, cms_quotation.email
				, cms_quotation.attachment
				, cms_quotation.remarks
				, cms_quotation.approvals
				, cms_quotation.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_quotation.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_quotation.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_quotation
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_quotation.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_quotation.created_by) AND cms_quotation.is_active in(1) ORDER BY quote_no DESC limit 0,10

[2018-11-24 18:55:21]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_quotation.quote_no
				, cms_quotation.quote_date
				, cms_quotation.client_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_quotation.attention_to
				, cms_quotation.email_content
				, cms_quotation.email
				, cms_quotation.attachment
				, cms_quotation.remarks
				, cms_quotation.approvals
				, cms_quotation.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_quotation.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_quotation.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_quotation
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_quotation.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_quotation.created_by) AND cms_quotation.is_active in(1) ORDER BY quote_no DESC limit 0,10

Function Details: get_document_archiving_list 
 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-11-24 18:56:30]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_document_archiving.doc_no
				, cms_document_archiving.doc_date
				, cms_document_archiving.client_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_document_archiving.from_date
				, cms_document_archiving.to_date
				, IF(cms_document_archiving.notify = 1, 'Yes','No') as notify
				, cms_document_archiving.notify_by
				, cms_document_archiving.notify_email
				, cms_document_archiving.attachment
				, cms_document_archiving.remarks
				, cms_document_archiving.approvals
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_document_archiving.doc_type) as doc_type
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_document_archiving.status_id) as status_name
				, cms_document_archiving.created_date
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_document_archiving.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_document_archiving
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_document_archiving.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_document_archiving.created_by) AND cms_document_archiving.is_active in(1) ORDER BY doc_no DESC limit 0,10

SELECT cms_quotation.quote_no
				, cms_quotation.quote_date
				, cms_quotation.client_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_quotation.attention_to
				, cms_quotation.email_content
				, cms_quotation.email
				, cms_quotation.attachment
				, cms_quotation.remarks
				, cms_quotation.approvals
				, cms_quotation.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_quotation.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_quotation.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_quotation
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_quotation.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_quotation.created_by) AND cms_quotation.is_active in(1) ORDER BY quote_no DESC limit 0,10

				, cms_quotation.email_content
				, cms_quotation.email
				, cms_quotation.attachment
				, cms_quotation.remarks
				, cms_quotation.approvals
				, cms_quotation.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_quotation.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_quotation.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_quotation
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_quotation.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_quotation.created_by) AND cms_quotation.is_active in(1) ORDER BY quote_no DESC limit 0,10


[2018-11-24 18:57:10]

 Param Details :

Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT count(token) as token_count  FROM cms_emp_login_sessions WHERE token	= '03293db0a67871ad036730841905cf98'


[2018-11-24 18:57:10]
Function Details: get_quotation_details 
 Param Details : 
{"quotation_no":"1007"}


[2018-11-24 18:57:10]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT 
						  quote_no		
						, date_format(quote_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as quote_date	
						, client_id
						, attention_to
						, email_content
						, email
						, attachment
						, remarks
						, approvals
						, status_id
						, is_active
						, date_format(created_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as created_date
						, created_by			
					 FROM cms_quotation WHERE quote_no = 1007

[2018-11-24 18:57:56]
Function Details: get_quotation_list 
 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-11-24 18:57:56]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_quotation.quote_no
				, cms_quotation.quote_date
				, cms_quotation.client_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_quotation.attention_to
				, cms_quotation.email_content
				, cms_quotation.email
				, cms_quotation.attachment
				, cms_quotation.remarks
				, cms_quotation.approvals
				, cms_quotation.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_quotation.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_quotation.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_quotation
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_quotation.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_quotation.created_by) AND cms_quotation.is_active in(1) ORDER BY quote_no DESC limit 0,10


[2018-11-24 18:57:58]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT id,name,office_email FROM cms_employees WHERE id =15 AND is_active = 1


[2018-11-24 18:57:58]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT id,name FROM cms_clients WHERE is_active = 1


[2018-11-24 18:57:58]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_employees.id, cms_employees.name, cms_employees.office_email as email, cms_master_employer.employer_name  as company_name FROM cms_employees INNER JOIN cms_master_employer ON cms_employees.employer_id = cms_master_employer.id WHERE cms_employees.is_active = 1


[2018-11-24 18:57:58]

 Param Details: 
SELECT template_content FROM cms_master_template WHERE id = 25


[2018-11-24 18:57:58]

 Param Details:

Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_quotation.quote_no
				, cms_quotation.quote_date
				, cms_quotation.client_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_quotation.attention_to
				, cms_quotation.email_content
				, cms_quotation.email
				, cms_quotation.attachment
				, cms_quotation.remarks
				, cms_quotation.approvals
				, cms_quotation.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_quotation.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_quotation.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_quotation
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_quotation.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_quotation.created_by) AND cms_quotation.is_active in(1) ORDER BY quote_no DESC limit 0,10

Function Details: db_query
 Param Details:

{"client_id":"","created_by":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-11-24 19:05:39]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_quotation.quote_no
				, cms_quotation.quote_date
				, cms_quotation.client_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_quotation.attention_to
				, cms_quotation.email_content
				, cms_quotation.email
				, cms_quotation.attachment
				, cms_quotation.remarks
				, cms_quotation.approvals
				, cms_quotation.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_quotation.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_quotation.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_quotation
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_quotation.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_quotation.created_by) AND cms_quotation.is_active in(1) ORDER BY quote_no DESC limit 0,10

					 FROM cms_quotation WHERE quote_no = 1001

Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_quotation.quote_no
				, cms_quotation.quote_date
				, cms_quotation.client_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_quotation.attention_to
				, cms_quotation.email_content
				, cms_quotation.email
				, cms_quotation.attachment
				, cms_quotation.remarks
				, cms_quotation.approvals
				, cms_quotation.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_quotation.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_quotation.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_quotation
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_quotation.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_quotation.created_by) AND cms_quotation.is_active in(1) ORDER BY quote_no DESC limit 0,10

Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_quotation.quote_no
				, cms_quotation.quote_date
				, cms_quotation.client_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_quotation.attention_to
				, cms_quotation.email_content
				, cms_quotation.email
				, cms_quotation.attachment
				, cms_quotation.remarks
				, cms_quotation.approvals
				, cms_quotation.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_quotation.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_quotation.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_quotation
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_quotation.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_quotation.created_by) AND cms_quotation.is_active in(1) ORDER BY quote_no DESC limit 0,10

SELECT cms_employees.id,cms_employees.name FROM cms_employees INNER JOIN cms_employees_access ON cms_employees.id = cms_employees_access.emp_id WHERE cms_employees_access.module_id = 7 AND cms_employees_access.view_it = 1 AND cms_employees.is_active = 1

[2018-11-24 19:24:23]
Function Details: get_quotation_list 
 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-11-24 19:24:23]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_quotation.quote_no
				, cms_quotation.quote_date
				, cms_quotation.client_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_quotation.attention_to
				, cms_quotation.email_content
				, cms_quotation.email
				, cms_quotation.attachment
				, cms_quotation.remarks
				, cms_quotation.approvals
				, cms_quotation.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_quotation.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_quotation.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_quotation
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_quotation.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_quotation.created_by) AND cms_quotation.is_active in(1) ORDER BY quote_no DESC limit 0,10


[2018-11-24 19:24:40]
Business Layer: {"token":"03293db0a67871ad036730841905cf98","method":"get_quotation_details","data":{"quotation_no":"1001"}}

[2018-11-24 19:24:40]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT count(token) as token_count  FROM cms_emp_login_sessions WHERE token	= '03293db0a67871ad036730841905cf98'


[2018-11-24 19:24:40]
Function Details: get_quotation_details 
 Param Details : 
{"quotation_no":"1001"}


[2018-11-24 19:24:40]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT 
						  quote_no		
						, date_format(quote_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as quote_date	
						, client_id
						, attention_to
						, email_content
						, email
						, attachment
						, remarks
						, approvals
						, status_id
						, is_active
						, date_format(created_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as created_date
						, created_by			
					 FROM cms_quotation WHERE quote_no = 1001

[2018-11-24 19:25:11]
Function Details: get_quotation_list 
 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-11-24 19:25:11]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_quotation.quote_no
				, cms_quotation.quote_date
				, cms_quotation.client_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_quotation.attention_to
				, cms_quotation.email_content
				, cms_quotation.email
				, cms_quotation.attachment
				, cms_quotation.remarks
				, cms_quotation.approvals
				, cms_quotation.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_quotation.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_quotation.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_quotation
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_quotation.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_quotation.created_by) AND cms_quotation.is_active in(1) ORDER BY quote_no DESC limit 0,10


[2018-11-24 19:30:38]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT id,descr FROM cms_master_list WHERE category_id = 24


[2018-11-24 19:30:38]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT id,descr FROM cms_master_list WHERE category_id = 28


[2018-11-24 19:30:38]
Function Details: db_execute_custom_sql
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_appt_pic.id,cms_appt_pic.name,cms_appt_pic.email, cms_clients.name as company_name
				FROM cms_appt_pic INNER JOIN cms_clients ON cms_appt_pic.client = cms_clients.id
				WHERE cms_appt_pic.created_by = 15 
				 UNION ALL
				SELECT cms_employees.id, cms_employees.name, cms_employees.office_email as email,
				cms_master_employer.employer_name  as company_name
				FROM
				cms_employees INNER JOIN cms_master_employer ON cms_employees.employer_id = cms_master_employer.id
				WHERE cms_employees.is_active = 1


[2018-11-24 19:30:39]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details:

Function Details: db_execute_custom_sql
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_appt_pic.id,cms_appt_pic.name,cms_appt_pic.email, cms_clients.name as company_name
				FROM cms_appt_pic INNER JOIN cms_clients ON cms_appt_pic.client = cms_clients.id
				WHERE cms_appt_pic.created_by = 15 
				 UNION ALL
				SELECT cms_employees.id, cms_employees.name, cms_employees.office_email as email,
				cms_master_employer.employer_name  as company_name
				FROM
				cms_employees INNER JOIN cms_master_employer ON cms_employees.employer_id = cms_master_employer.id
				WHERE cms_employees.is_active = 1

[2018-11-24 19:31:25]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_quotation.quote_no
				, cms_quotation.quote_date
				, cms_quotation.client_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_quotation.attention_to
				, cms_quotation.email_content
				, cms_quotation.email
				, cms_quotation.attachment
				, cms_quotation.remarks
				, cms_quotation.approvals
				, cms_quotation.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_quotation.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_quotation.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_quotation
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_quotation.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_quotation.created_by) AND cms_quotation.is_active in(1) ORDER BY quote_no DESC limit 0,10
